testcase.name: Test the post end point to create a job entry

testcase.name: Test the put end point to update the job entry

failure.message: e2e.feature:30 - status code was: 404, expected: 200, response time: 131, url: http://localhost:9897/normal/webapi/update, response: {"message":"Failed to update Entry [jobId=2, jobTitle=Software Engg, jobDescription=To develop andriod application and web application, experience=[Ljava.lang.Object;@2c17544e, project=[[projectName=Movie App, technology=[Kotlin, SQL Lite, Gradle]], [projectName=Web App, technology=[Selenium, UFT, RPA]]]]"}
